content:
# It seems that I am still facing the issue where the environment does not recognize my movements correctly, as it continues to report my position as (0, 0) instead of the actual position I moved to.
# This indicates that the environment may not be updating my position correctly, which is preventing me from placing the stone furnace.

# To address this, I will attempt to reset my position by moving back to the origin (0, 0) and then try a different approach to reach the stone patch.
move_to(Position(0, 0))  # Moving back to the origin to reset my position.
